Sentencas: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs) are a promising fuel cell technology but often suffer from low ionic conductivity of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes

Sentencas: Herein, we develop a solid electrolyte with high ionic conductivity based on thulium (Tm)-doped composite Sr0.1TmxCe0.9-xO2-delta
Titulo: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes
Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes

Sentencas: The fuel cell using Tm-doped SrCeO2-delta electrolyte achieved the power output of 682 mW/cm(2) at 550 degrees C with an open-circuit voltage (OCV) of 1.03 V, whereas the fuel cell with Sr0.1Ce0.9O2-delta electrolyte produced a power density of 515 mW/cm(2) with an OCV of 1.02 V. Doping of 10% Tm into SrCeO2-delta enables the creation of oxygen vacancies in the structure, which enables the enhancement in ionic conductivity and provides the fast transport path.
Titulo: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes

Sentencas: Thus, doping of both Sr and Tm into CeO2 enhances the generation of high content of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes

Sentencas: The calculated ionic conductivity of Tm-doped SrCeO2-delta is 0.13 S/cm which is appreciably higher than that of the pure SrCeO2-delta (0.104 S/cm at 550 degrees C).
Titulo: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes

Sentencas: Moreover, the enhancement of power output can also be ascribed to band bending at the electrolyte-electrode interface, which overall decreases the inherent electronic properties of reduced ceria while increases the ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes
Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes
Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes
Low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on Tm-doped SrCeO2-δ semiconductor electrolytes
